meanings.definition: The act of bringing a ship into a berth.
meanings.sent1: The berthing of the large cargo ship was done carefully by the experienced captain.
meanings.sent2: The harbor master directed the ship to its designated berthing spot.
meanings.sent3: The seagull watched the berthing of the ship with great interest.
meanings.sent4: The berthing of the ship in the calm harbor symbolized the end of a long journey.
meanings.sent5: The crew celebrated the successful berthing of their vessel with cheers and high-fives.

meanings.definition: A place in a port or harbor where a ship can be moored.
meanings.sent1: The sailors gathered at the berthing to prepare for departure.
meanings.sent2: The new berthing at the port provided ample space for the incoming ships.
meanings.sent3: The seagulls perched on the wooden posts near the berthing, looking for fish.
meanings.sent4: The old berthing stood as a silent witness to the changing tides of the harbor.
meanings.sent5: The lights from the distant berthing guided the ships safely into the port.

meanings.definition: The process of securing a ship in a berth.
meanings.sent1: The berthing of the ship required the crew to work together efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The captain oversaw the berthing process to ensure no mistakes were made.
meanings.sent3: The playful dolphins swam around the ship during the berthing, adding a touch of joy.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic sound of ropes being tied echoed through the harbor during the berthing.
meanings.sent5: The stormy weather made the berthing of the ship a challenging task for the crew.

meanings.definition: The allocation of a berth to a ship.
meanings.sent1: The berthing of the ship was delayed due to the late allocation of a berth.
meanings.sent2: The port authority announced the berthing schedule for the incoming ships.
meanings.sent3: The seagulls squabbled over the prime berthing spot near the fish market.
meanings.sent4: The efficient berthing allocation system streamlined the port operations.
meanings.sent5: The captain negotiated with the harbor master for a better berthing location for his ship.
